attributes.action: Introduce new legislation forcing companies to only make & sell silent fireworks
attributes.additional_details:
People of the town of Collecchio in Italy are doing something about it. 

The local government has introduced new legislation forcing citizens to use silent fireworks as a way of respecting the animals and reducing the stress caused them.

Setti make fireworks without the deafening sounds normally associated with a firework display.

You can do something about it to too 

http://travel.excite.co.uk/town-in-italy-starts-using-silent-fireworks-as-a-way-of-respecting-their-animals-N52632.html
attributes.background: I've read of at least four missing dogs over the fireworks period in my close local area with at least one ran over and others still missing due to them bolting. All animals are greatly disturbed by this noise and its really not needed. Silent fireworks already exist.
